presets.name: Default Network & Cache Settings
presets.description: This preset will restore the default settings for the 'network' and 'cache' categories.

presets.name: Zero Cache Preset
presets.description: This preset will enable 'zero cache' on your device. [B]DO NOT[/B] use this preset on devices with low amounts of free storage, or that have flash storage. [B]It is only safe[/B] to use on devices with hard drives.

presets.name: Low-RAM Device Preset
presets.description: This preset can be used on devices with less than 2GB of RAM, like Amazon Fire Sticks.

presets.name: High-End Device Preset
presets.description: This preset can be used on devices with more than 2GB of RAM, like the Nvidia Shield.
